post_title: FS - Multiple T206 [No Longer For Sale]
post_content:
T206 Available for sale:

Red Murray (Portrait) SC 350/460/25 - $100 PPFF
Frank Owen SC 150/25 - $100 PPFF
Rube Oldring SC 150/30 - $100 PPFF
Tommy Leach SC 350/25 - $80 PPFF
Peaches Graham Piedmont 350/25 - $60 PPFF
George McBride Piedmont 350/25 - $60 PPFF

If you want to make a purchase of any of these cards:

1. The first person to post "I'll take it" for a specific card will get the card.  This post will secure that card in front of anyone else who may be in communication with me regarding that card.
2. Email me @ [url]jmanners51@gmail.com[/url] by putting the name of the card in the subject line and your address in the body of the email. 
3. Remit payment by PayPal (PPFF).
4.  I don't have easy access to a Post Office so please allow up to 5 days for me to get to the Post Office to mail the card.
